remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]
